titleStmt.title: Mr. Wallers speech in Parliament, at a conference of both Houses in the painted chamber. 6. Iuly 1641
Speech in Parliament, at a conference of both Houses in the painted chamber. 6. July 1641.
titleStmt.author: Waller, Edmund, 1606-1687.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. N[orton] for Abel Roper at the black spread Eagle over against Saint Dunstans Church in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: Concerning the impeachment of Sir Francis Crawley.
A variant has "Fagle" instead of "Eagle" in imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the black spread Eagle over against Saint Dunstans Church in Fleet-street
